QuestData.Title: The Mind's Eye
QuestData.Description: One of the Vale's many treasures lies nearby, on OUR side of the giant whirlpool. The Mind's Eye is held by an ogre mage, in the Mosh'Ogg ogre mound just to the northeast. His name is Mai'Zoth. From what I understand, he is vicious, and his magic is strong.$B$BAnd if he has the Mind's Eye, then his magic will be stronger still.$b$bThus far I've been unable to get near enough to take it from him. Will you give it a try?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: While powerful, Mai'Zoth is cowardly and will probably be hiding in the back of his cave.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Mind's Eye from Mai'Zoth.
QuestData.RewardText: You retrieved the eye! Your might is the stuff of legends, $n!$B$BAnd to think my brother and sister said we wouldn't find anything of worth here in the Vale. Hah! And I'm just getting started!
